meanings.definition: Enrols: to officially register or sign up for something
meanings.sent1: She enrols in the art class to learn how to paint.
meanings.sent2: He always enrols in the summer camp to have fun with friends.
meanings.sent3: The cat enrols in the catnip club for some feline fun.
meanings.sent4: Her enthusiasm enrols others to join the gardening club.
meanings.sent5: Enrolling in the dance class makes her heart dance with joy.

meanings.definition: Enrols: the act of officially registering or signing up for something
meanings.sent1: The enrols for the workshop are filling up quickly.
meanings.sent2: She received a certificate for her enrols in the training program.
meanings.sent3: The enrols for the pizza party exceeded expectations.
meanings.sent4: His enrols in the charity event made a positive impact.
meanings.sent5: The enrols in the book club opened up new literary worlds.
